entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
